sentences.en: Anticoagulation remains the mainstay of therapy for patients with venous thromboembolism.
sentences.cn: 抗凝仍然是主要治疗方法.

sentences.en: Improve the venous Circulatory disorders, and fragility of blood vessels ( microcirculation ) .
sentences.cn: 改善静脉 微循环 障碍及毛细血管脆性损伤.

sentences.en: Objective To discuss the Surgical management of venous leg ulcer.
sentences.cn: 目的探讨下肢静脉性溃疡的治疗.

sentences.en: Objective To observe the advantage of CLAVE connector in central venous catheterization.
sentences.cn: 目的观察可来福接头在深静脉置管中的应用优势.

sentences.en: Objective To sum up and analyse the experience of mesenteric venous thrombosis.
sentences.cn: 目的总结和分析肠系膜静脉血栓形成的经验体会.

sentences.en: ObjectiveTo discuss the intervention therapy of dural venous sinus thrombosis ( DVST ).
sentences.cn: 目的　探讨硬脑膜静脉窦血栓形成 ( DVST ) 的血管内介入治疗.

sentences.en: Patient being prepped for the venous sampling?
sentences.cn: 病人已经准备好做静脉采血了 吗 ?

sentences.en: Rapid - Inflation Intermittent Pneumatic Compression for Prevention of Deep Venous Thrombosis.
sentences.cn: 快速充气脉冲式气压预防深静脉血栓形成.

sentences.en: Suspending bracket design is able to avoid obstruction of venous reflux effectively.
sentences.cn: 悬空支架式设计,能有效避免静脉回流受阻.

sentences.en: The cirrhotic process obstructs the intrahepatic portion of the portal venous system.
sentences.cn: 肝硬化使门脉系统的肝内部分受阻.

sentences.en: The doctor kept telling him be ought to have these venous vessels stripped.
sentences.cn: 医生不断劝他把这些静脉血管全部摘除.

sentences.en: The rest of the systemic venous return is diverted into the right horn of the sinus.
sentences.cn: 其余的体静脉回流转到静脉窦右角.

sentences.en: The tourniquet should occlude venous and lymphatic return.
sentences.cn: 止血带应阻断静脉及淋巴回流.

sentences.en: They are used as a routine preventative treatmet of venous stasis.
sentences.cn: 使用这种袜子已成为预防静脉郁滞的常规措施.

sentences.en: To review the complications of central venous catheter ( CVT ) with its management.
sentences.cn: 目的:总结留置中心静脉导管的经验,探讨如何防治中心 静脉 留置导管的并发症.
